query: SELECT mes, ano, COUNT(*) as total_lojas, SUM(totalServicos) as soma_servicos, AVG(taxaReparacao) as media_taxa FROM resultados_mensais WHERE mes = 1 AND ano = 2026 GROUP BY mes, ano;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2rEtBRZHWZUfGJS.3b07a01772f8 --database 3c9MozLH35e233uWy5WDtH --execute SELECT mes, ano, COUNT(*) as total_lojas, SUM(totalServicos) as soma_servicos, AVG(taxaReparacao) as media_taxa FROM resultados_mensais WHERE mes = 1 AND ano = 2026 GROUP BY mes, ano;
